name: Amazon Essentials Women's Cotton Lightly Cushioned Crew Socks, 10 Pairs, Black, 4-7
review: These are lovely socks, a good fit and very comfortable. They are nice and soft and are a good length both in the foot and up the leg. Good elastication and they wash up well too. Well worth the money and I will definitely buy them again.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 February 2022

name: Amazon Essentials Women's Cotton Lightly Cushioned Crew Socks, 10 Pairs, Black, 4-7
review: My partner loves them.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 February 2024

name: Amazon Essentials Women's Cotton Lightly Cushioned Crew Socks, 10 Pairs, Black, 4-7
review: Decent socks for the price. I wanted them for my work boots and they're just the job. Would recommend these and would buy them again.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 February 2022

name: Amazon Essentials Women's Cotton Lightly Cushioned Crew Socks, 10 Pairs, Black, 4-7
review: Seem strong but nit as comfy as I like my socks to be.  Cuffs are heavy and tight which makes them uncomfortable and itchy after a few hours wear.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 January 2024

name: Amazon Essentials Women's Cotton Lightly Cushioned Crew Socks, 10 Pairs, Black, 4-7
review: I work for 12 hours on my feet in tactical boots.  They're comfy from the start of the shift through to the finish.  I've just placed another order.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 January 2023

name: Amazon Essentials Women's Cotton Lightly Cushioned Crew Socks, 10 Pairs, Black, 4-7
review: Really pleased with quality
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 November 2021

name: Amazon Essentials Women's Cotton Lightly Cushioned Crew Socks, 10 Pairs, Black, 4-7
review: But I gave it 3 * for good elasticity and reasonable price.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 November 2021

name: Amazon Essentials Women's Cotton Lightly Cushioned Crew Socks, 10 Pairs, Black, 4-7
review: these are not ladies socks ,they are gents and i wouldn,t wear them
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 April 2023

name: Amazon Essentials Women's Cotton Lightly Cushioned Crew Socks, 10 Pairs, Black, 4-7
review: The top of these socks is a smidge too tight for long term comfort (OK if you only wearing them for an hour or two). I'm not skinny-thin - but I kind of have regular sized ankles and size 4 feet. The length of the foot is slightly too long for me - but that's fine (most socks are too long) but i don't usually have issues with over tight tops.They are nice and soft though and have washed nicely.Update 17-11-2021 - a def con is how much black fluff they shed. If i go upstairs i leave fluff all over the biscuit coloured carpet. And, by bed time, all my toes have fluff between them. Downgraded to 2 stars, I'm afraid.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 February 2024

name: Amazon Essentials Women's Cotton Lightly Cushioned Crew Socks, 10 Pairs, Black, 4-7
review: Sizes way bigger than advertised. Received size 8-10, not 6-10. Do not fit my size 6 feet so I am returning.Could not exchange for a different size.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 August 2020
